text: Kaya to manusya, jyacyakarita tyaci duskarme susobhita keli geli aheta tara to tyam (karmam) na cangale samajato (kaya to margadarsana prapta karanarya manasa samana ahe?) (Niscitaca) allaha jyala icchito, margabhrasta karato, ani jyala icchito marga dakhavito. Tevha tumhi tyancyabaddala duhkhi kasti ho'una apala jiva kasta yataneta taku naye. He loka je kahi karita aheta nihsansaya, allaha te cangalya prakare janato
